summary: usain bolt will compete at the iaaf/btc world relays in the bahamas . the six-time olympic gold medallist will compete at the relay championship on may 2 and 3 as part of the jamaican team . 'i'm happy to be part of the jamaican team for the iaaf / btc world relays in the bahamas. i am fit, healthy and ready to run,' said bolt .

explain: Usain Bolt, a six-time Olympic gold medallist, will be participating in the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas from May 2-3, representing Jamaica. Bolt is looking forward to the event and confirmed his fitness, health, and readiness to participate in the relay championship.
Usain Bolt, a six-time Olympic gold medallist, will represent the Jamaican team at the IAAF/BTC World Relays in the Bahamas on May 2 and 3, as a relay championship contender.
Bolt is excited to represent Jamaica and hopes for a positive and engaging environment at the event.
